productName: DCP-T525W 3-in-1 multifunction printer with wireless and mobile printing to work-on-the go
description:
A4 print speed up to 16 ipm (Black)/ 9 ipm (Colour)
WiFi, AirPrint, Mopria, WiFi Direct, USB 2.0
1-line LCD, 128 MB Memory, 150 Sheets Paper Tray
Full ink bottles included. Yield up to 15000/5000 pages (black/colour)*
